provis.utils

provis.utils.atminfo module

provis.utils.atminfo.import_atm_mass_info()

Funtion to load atomic mass from atmmass.csv, to be used in main

Returns

dict - dictionary of atomic mass by atom name

provis.utils.atminfo.import_atm_size_info(vw=0)

Funtion to load atomic radii from atmsize.csv, to be used in main

Parameters

  • name – vw - option to return vanderwaals radius

  • type – bool - returns if true

Returns

dict - dictionary of atomic radius by atom name

Returns

dict - dictionary of color by atom name

Returns

dict - !optional! return dictionary of vw rdius by atom name

provis.utils.bond_parser module

provis.utils.bond_parser.bond_parser(filename)

Calculates bond information from mol2 file.

Parameters

filename – str Name of file to open

Returns

dataFrame Pandas df with bonds

provis.utils.msms_caller module

provis.utils.msms_caller.msms_script(name, dens)

Run the msms script for given filename and density Works on both linux and windows (could easily be extended with other parameters)

Parameters

  • name – name - Name of file

  • type – str

  • name – dens - Density of triangulation

  • type – float

Returns

void - face and vert files

provis.utils.pdb_to_xyzr_caller module

provis.utils.pdb_to_xyzr_caller.pdb_to_xyzr_script(name, solv, bash=0)

Run the pdb_to_xyzr script for given filename Works on both linux and windows (could easily be extended with other parameters)

Parameters

  • name – name - Name of file

  • type – str

  • name – solv - If True also convert solvent atoms, False only structural atoms

  • type – bool

  • name – bash - If you want to run original script, set to 1

  • type – bool

Returns

void - xyzr file
